briefTitle: Hospital Based Group Intervention for Breast Cancer Patients.
officialTitle: Effects of Group Intervention on Anxiety, Depression and Quality of Life Among Women Operated for Breast Cancer. A Randomized, Prospective Study.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Anxiety, Depression, Quality of Life, Coping
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Scores on Health-related quality of life
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Verified breast cancer diagnosis Age 18 years or more but under 75 years -

Exclusion Criteria:

Diagnoses of metastatic breast cancer Do not read or write Norwegian Diagnoses of mental retardation, severe or untreated psychopathology, dementia Diagnoses of any immunologic condition or disease

-
